subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Although the Devils were crisp and energetic early, the Sabres proved to be too much. Erik Rasmussen and Patrik Elias scored for the Devils in the last 39 seconds of the game, but Buffalo’s lead was too big.
snippet: Although the Devils were crisp and energetic early, the Sabres proved to be too much. Erik Rasmussen and Patrik Elias scored for the Devils in the last 39 seconds of the game, but Buffalo’s lead was too big.
